data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Group activities and team works will definitely boost the morale of a group as a whole. For example, schools can organize swimming carnivals, athletics carnivals, or camping programs periodically. In swimming carnivals and athletics carnivals, students can be split into several groups and compete on different activities worth various points, the carnival will then accumulate points by groups and decide the winning group. For camping, students will live in the same loge and try to cooperate to solve problems. Those strategies would gather the whole group together and boost students' morale.
data.referenceText: What types of things can help boost students or employees morale?
data.referenceTranslate: 什么类型的事情可以帮助提高学生或员工的士气。
